title: Will we get a 3-4 page texted preview of the Ashe comic?
body: Usually comics, a week beforehand coming out, post 3 or 4 pages of  texted previews on their official site or ask some other comic site like CBR to promote it for them. We got some Ashe comic previews but they were without text or speech bubbles. Is the textless preview the only preview we will be getting? Iâ€™m just wondering.

replies.body:
Donno,  but universe should have issue #1 up in about a week. (Free!)

Comixology should have it same day with the bonus content. (About 22 bonus pages of concept art etc...)
Wait, it's coming that soon?!  I guess I'm used to waiting since a lot of stuff for the game is announced many months in advance (Clash, Uncapped Levels come to mind).
